data.title: Kodagu
data.meta_description: Kodagu  - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document provides information about Kodagu district in Karnataka, India. It discusses the district's geography, noting that it is located in the Western Ghats and has an area of 4,102 square kilometers. It borders several other districts and has a hilly terrain with elevations from 900 to 1,750 meters. The main river is the Kaveri. The document also summarizes Kodagu's history, demographics including the dominant Kodava people, economy centered around agriculture and tourism, and cultural aspects such as traditional costumes and festivals celebrating the Kaveri river and harvest.
